entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Red Earth Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:27 a.m. MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 17. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
